partintro.para: Jdbc-support provides functionalities to fend off security risk of SQL Injection by expanding open source p6spy and log or reprocess the finally executed query. Jdbc-support plugin includes library and default setup needed for this functionality.
Enter the command as below at Command Window and install jdbc-support plugin.
By using installed(mvn anyframe:installed) or jetty:run(mvn clean jetty:run) command, installation result can be checked.
